EmailTemplate.name: 1 - Donation Commitment After Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Here's how you can make a donation to Live Different!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for filling out our survey at the end of your Build Trip! You've given us valuable feedback that will make a real difference to the improvement of our programs!
At the end of your survey, you let us know that you'd like to make a monthly or one time donation towards our programs. Your generosity will go a long way towards bringing change to the communities that we partner with!
You can complete this commitment by visiting the donation section of our website here (http://livedifferent.com/donate), or by calling us at our office to process it over the phone.
Thank you again for the contribution you made volunteering on a Live Different Build, and for wanting to stay involved in our programs!
Live Different believes in open, transparent communication with our donors and partners and we welcome your input, questions, or comments. Please feel free to either call our office at 1-866-432-4464 or email us anytime!
Sincerely,
Live Different Team
